attributes.action: hold a refererendum before handing over any more powers to Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2004 Tony Blair promised a referendum on the then upcomming EU constitution.  Having being rejected by France and Holland the politicians have changed it to an amending treaty rather than a constitutional treaty.  Tony Blair is using this change of words to force the same EU constutuion onto the people of Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
